# externalContentProtectionStatus

**Instance Property**

The external protection status for the content key based on all attached displays.

## Declaration

```swift
var externalContentProtectionStatus: AVExternalContentProtectionStatus { get }
```

## Discussion

This property isn’t key-value observable. Instead, use the [doc://com.apple.avfoundation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVContentKeySessionDelegate/contentKeySession(_:externalProtectionStatusDidChangeFor:)] delegate method to monitor changes to this value.

## Inspecting protection status

- **revoke()**
